title: Anongyn
author: Anongyn
content: BRUNO WALLETWEBSITE |  TELEGRAM | TELEGRAM CHANNEL | TWITTERBrunowallet is a decentralized wallet with auto-staking directly to your address in more than 10 different coinsForget about staking to your personal account and paying withdrawal fees. All Brunowallet users earn daily percentage from auto-staking directly to their auto-staking addressBrunowallet does not store personal information and has no access to users' funds. Every user after registration receives a unique private key which is needed to access their accountYour private key = your protectionREFERRAL CAMPAIGNTAKE PART IN THE BIGGEST ETH REFERRAL CAMPAIGN 2022!Brunowallet has 4 levels of affiliate program:1 - level gives you 0.0025 ETH2 - level gives you 0.002 ETH3 - level gives you 0.0015 ETH4 - level gives you 0.001 ETHCreate a wallet and spread your referral link everywhere and start earning on the passiveWEEKLY ETH LOTTERYEvery week Brunowallet holds a drawing for 1 ETH among BRW holdersTo enter the lottery you just need to hold 100,000 BRW at your addressBOUNTY CAMPAIGNBOUNTY REWARD POOL = 100 ETH DURATION = 8 WEEKS [06/23/2022 - 08/18/2022]ARTICLE CAMPAIGN - 15 ETH YOUTUBE CAMPAIGN - 35 ETH TELEGRAM CAMPAIGN - 15 ETHREFERRAL CAMPAIGN - 10 ETHTELEGRAM INVITE CAMPAIGN - 25 ETHTWITTER CAMPAGN - 10 ETHFACEBOOK SHILL CAMPAIGN - 15 ETHGENERAL TERMS AND CONDITIONSIf you want to take part in this bounty you have to join in the following telegram groups:Telegram Community - https://t.me/brunowalletTelegram Channel -  https://t.me/brunowalletnewsBefore filling out the form you have to make a proof of authentication post in this threadPROOF OF AUTHENTICATIONCode:Bitcointalk Profile Link:Telegram Username:Bounty Campaign`s:TELEGRAM INVITE CAMPAIGNInvite your friends to Telegram Chat and get rewardedREWARDS1 Friend = 1 StakeMax - 500 FriendsFORMhttps://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeS9_8fOHlbv8smJuCTOqad9Wg8ZGuob-8Kg_MknCTYTHs7nA/viewformFACEBOOK SHILL CAMPAIGNRULES● Make posts about Bruno Wallet Referral Campaign or Welcome Bonus in cryptocurrency Facebook groups, maximum 10 posts per day● Post must contain text 50+ characters, and hashtag: #DeFi #BSC #Airdrop #Crypto #PresaleREWARDS1 stake per one post in any crypto groupFORMhttps://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfvtHo1-p2GqIijW5-raqqYTXXu1DFMlIrlrKLm4VM70a9_1A/viewformTWITTER CAMPAIGNRULES●  Must have at least 50 followers●  Follow and like the official Twitter account: https://twitter.com/brunowalletoff●  Make 1 tweet and 1 re-tweet every day. Use information from official social networks. Your tweet should have hashtags: #BSC #DeFi #Crypto #Airdrop #PresaleREWARDS● 50 - 500 Followers: 1 stake, per one tweet or re-tweet● 501 - 1000 Followers: 2 stakes, per one tweet or re-tweet● 1001 - 3000 Followers: 3 stakes, per one tweet or re-tweet● 3001 - 5000 Followers: 4 stakes per one tweet or re-tweet● 5001+ Followers: 5 stakes per one tweet or re-tweetFORMhttps://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSekxS5J7TMPm_dezOQHWkq9pDloOkH04Tnh4FkKixnGh3INQA/viewformYOUTUBE CAMPAIGNRULES● Video must be 2 minutes long● Videos must include link to the official website in the description● Video mustbe published on a crypto related YouTube channel with minimum 150 subscribers● Plagiarism or use of other's material will be considered as an invalid submission● No more than five videos from one person● Use these hashtags in your videos/articles: #BSC #DeFi #crypto #blockchainREWARDS● Excellent: 4 stakes (High quality video and >4000 subscribers)● High: 3 stakes (Good quality video and >2000 subscribers)● Good: 2 stake (Average quality video and >1000 subscribers)● Average: 1 stake (Average quality video and >150 subscribers)FORMhttps://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScemdGP-5Fc8zvoFKpSZHAaQ3c3c0KH5u-WEMpkpFtozZ82oQ/viewformARTICLE CAMPAIGNRULES● Article must have at least 500 words● Post your article on Medium,Steem,Publish0x and other popular blogs● Only quality articles will be accepted and rewarded● Use these hashtags in your videos/articles: #BSC #DeFi #crypto #blockchainREWARDS● Original article: 5-10 stakesFORMhttps://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc4o1ossGMqwLFx1-PXWk1irYOYNCS8qpAFVFPXdzC363WfbA/viewformTELEGRAM CAMPAIGNRULES● Join https://t.me/brunowallet● Join https://t.me/brunowalletnewsREWARDS● 1 stake● 10 stakes for setting nameFORMhttps://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSewDu6OcppeWtYnpufBz7GV0A3wx9IcpVChkXIywss6wYfAMw/viewformREFERRAL CAMPAIGN1 - Level gives you 0.0025 ETH2 - Level gives you 0.002 ETH3 - Level gives you 0.0015 ETH4 - Level gives you 0.001 ETHSpread your referral link everywhere and start earning on the passiveSPREADSHEEThttps://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Fc-hjbAypXE27OzKzGKQCJFfGAvEGyYd7ccxlIVCrvA/edit?usp=sharing
